attributes.action: Sack Sarah Shoesmith, the Paediatrician who did not recognise fractured ribs or a broken back and the social worker involved in the case.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above should be sacked and not allowed to have anything more to do with children or the care of children. They should not be allowed to resign.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
